trans-unit.source: If a sales order is placed for an item with different production variants containing the aforementioned criteria, a production order is created under consideration of the different production structures.

seg-source.mrk: If a sales order is placed for an item with different production variants containing the aforementioned criteria, a production order is created under consideration of the different production structures.

trans-unit.source: For example, item P-10600 has different production structures.

seg-source.mrk: For example, item P-10600 has different production structures.

trans-unit.source: If item P-10600 with variant LOS-A and location MAINWH is entered on a sales order and a production order is created for this line, the production structure PST-V-006 – with its Production BOM and Routing No. – is used to calculate the production order routing and components.

seg-source.mrk: If item P-10600 with variant LOS-A and location MAINWH is entered on a sales order and a production order is created for this line, the production structure PST-V-006 – with its Production BOM and Routing No.
– is used to calculate the production order routing and components.

trans-unit.source: : Items with different criteria on a sales order

seg-source.mrk: : Items with different criteria on a sales order

trans-unit.source: Production order lines are calculated using the different production structure variants and their specific BOM and routing information.

seg-source.mrk: Production order lines are calculated using the different production structure variants and their specific BOM and routing information.

trans-unit.source: : Production Order for sales order with different item criteria

seg-source.mrk: : Production Order for sales order with different item criteria

trans-unit.source: As <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref286332226" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 3</MadCap:xref> illustrates, production structure PST-V-001 was used on the first line because the quantity was between 100 and 500, and the second line uses PST-V-002 because the quantity was greater than 501. Refer to the Production Structure settings in <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref286332237" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about the remaining lines.

seg-source.mrk: As <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref286332226" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 3</MadCap:xref> illustrates, production structure PST-V-001 was used on the first line because the quantity was between 100 and 500, and the second line uses PST-V-002 because the quantity was greater than 501.

Refer to the Production Structure settings in <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref286332237" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about the remaining lines.
